entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Wet snow changing to snow this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
